imdb.title: Rainbow: Nishakubou no shichinin
imdb.plot: Set in 1955, the anime follows the story of seven teenagers locked in a reformatory, waiting for a ray of light in a daily hell of suffering and humiliation, focusing especially on how they faced the life once regained freedom.

episodes.title: After the Rain
episodes.plot: Six young criminals under 18 years old goes to prison and they encounter there a mysterious prison mate. They fight with the mysterious prison mate. They are beaten by him. Then prison guard comes and beats the mysterious guy named Sakuragi. After he was beaten by prison guard the others feels upset about beating and They properly meet with him. They realize that they are at the bottom of cauldron Hell.

episodes.title: Fugitive
episodes.plot: Apparently joe has one sister named meg and he got news about her. Her sister was giving away to a foster-father.He escapes from reformatory with help of his other six friends to save his sister. He sees his sister but encounters with unexpected response from her.

episodes.title: Distrust
episodes.plot: Two weeks later failed escape attempt of joe. Uncovered isolates himself from other 6 cellmates. Guard realizes that approaches him to use him. Guard says that Sakuragi is in prison because he killed his parents. Then Uncovered declares it in front of everyone. And the others starts to question Sakuragi whether he should be trusted or not.

episodes.title: Dissolve
episodes.plot: This episode continues where the 3rd episode finishes, there is fire in reformatory and our main character Sakuragi tries to find his fellows however the guard has evil plans. In the end this saving attempt strengthen bound between our seven characters.

episodes.title: Someday...
episodes.plot: Good guard Kumagai is replaced with Evil Guard Ishiara thus for a short time our seven characters lives peacefully in reformatory. Sakuragi's release date from reformatory is soon. This disturbs evil guard Ishira so he comes back and do plans to torture him. Sakuragi is determined to not respond these evil plans. Mario is so upset about Sakuragi's condition because he is constantly beaten up by other inmates in another special cell. Mario decides to save him and this changes everything.

episodes.title: Truth
episodes.plot: Ishira and dr.Sasaki's have plans to kill Sakuragi before he gets out of the reformatory. On the other hand, the ohter six cell mates determines to protect Sakuragi no matter what happens.

episodes.title: Determination
episodes.plot: Sakuragi has only 6 days to get out of the reformatory. Sasaki and Ishiara increase their torture level to make sure he'll be out as dead. They learn Kumagai helps Sakuragi.

episodes.title: Freedom
episodes.plot: The other six friends of Sakuragi think that the only way to save Sakuragi is to let him escape out of the reformatory. They start the action.

episodes.title: Lament
episodes.plot: After Sakuragi and 3 boys escaped from reformatory, they tried to survive outside and Sakurgi was deeply hurt. Nurse Setsuko remebers her word Mario and helps them.Sakuragi awakens and sends one of the boys to reformatory again to save other 3. The on the other hand Mario and Turtle try to find money not to rely on So much to nurse Setsuko. They encounter with a woman named Lily and accept her offer for gaining money but things don't go according to their plans.

episodes.title: Vengeance
episodes.plot: Ishiara and dr.Sasaki learns Sakuragi and the other fugitive's hideout. Mario joins another boxing match and the Turtle is caught by the polices.The soldier learns that he will be released from the reformatory.

episodes.title: Showdown
episodes.plot: While Mario fights with american boxer in the ring Sakuragi confronts with Ishiara. Dr sasaki was also determined get rid off Sakuragi too so he makes his evil plans about him.

episodes.title: Promise
episodes.plot: Although six guys met under the tree they promised to each other to meet. They think only one thing after they saw dr. Sasaki is running for election to become mayor. Avenging Sakuragi.

episodes.title: Recollect
episodes.plot: This episode is simply summary of 12 episode.

episodes.title: Revenge
episodes.plot: The 6 cleared up their mind to avenge Sakuragi. Uncovered makes plan to get ridd of dr.sasaki. Also, Mario confronts with Ishiara.

episodes.title: Annoyance
episodes.plot: Mario invites Setsuko to theater to watch a movie. They begin to like each other but Setsuko's family forces her to marry another rich man. This situtation upsets Mario and he involves in a fight where he works. And he is arrested for assault charges but his other five friends makes a plan to save him.

episodes.title: Hidden
episodes.plot: 5 friends of Mario tries to save Mario preventing him to go to prison. Uncover makes the plan and the others help him to practice the plan.

episodes.title: Parting
episodes.plot: Mario confronts setsuko and reveals his feelings about her. Joe finds a chance to prove himself as a singer but this chance comes with obstacles.

episodes.title: Unbreakable
episodes.plot: Joe's manager uses joe and tells him to break out his close friends. Turtle upset about this and Mario talks about it to Joe. He says that all of them supports him. When joe is in the trouble he could call them because Mario's speech reminds him how their bond is so tight.

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.plot: Joe is abducted by his former band who has treated him as a trash already. Joe gives a message to boy to reach Mario that explains he is in trouble. Mario and the others come for him to keep his dream alive. Although, joe has supports of his friends, he couldn't make his dream right completely but he finds whatever he seeks for in the first place to sing.

episodes.title: Vocation
episodes.plot: After yakuza saw how Mario and the others had saved joe president of a yakuza family offers them a job. Mario kindly rejects, but cabbage considers that offer. And his plans don't work out the way that he thought.

episodes.title: Blindness
episodes.plot: Uncovered invites Turtle to his home for dinner. He introduces him to his family. Uncovered wants money from him as his education expenses.Turtle gives money and then Uncovered's brothers warn him. Uncovered fell in love with a prostitute. Turtle tries to sober him but he responds harsly. Turtle mentions about this Mario and Soldier.

episodes.title: Emergence
episodes.plot: Uncovered determines to run away with the prostitute named Eri but Eri has her plans too.

episodes.title: Chance
episodes.plot: While Turtle selling cigarette encounters with an old man. Then old man offers him a job. In the mean time Lily is deceived by general and throws out of her home.Turtle swears to do something about it.

episodes.title: Desperate
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Independence
episodes.plot: While Mario and Lily seeks Turtle.Turtle completes mr. Sugi's task. Mario and Lily brings Turtle U.S. embassy for examination.After that Lily dissappers from sight.

episodes.title: Over the Rainbow
episodes.plot: Everyone make their dream come true except Mario. Now it is his time.With help of the American soldier jeffrey that he has beaten before in the ring , Mario returns to his boxing dreams again.
